doc:
Rudy Ramos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rudy_Ramos 0 Rudy Ramos (born September 19, 1950) is an American actor and musician whose films include Helter Skelter (1976), The Enforcer (1976), The Driver (1978), Defiance (1980), Beverly Hills Cop II (1987), Quicksilver (1986), Colors (1988), and Open House (1987).The acting career of Rudy Ramos has covered six decades and started with an appearance on the television show, Ironside in 1969. Six months later he was cast as a series regular, playing the part of Wind the volatile half-breed Indian boy in the legendary television western The High Chaparral. Rudy_Ramos ( born September_19_,_1950 ) is an_American_actor_and_musician whose_films include Helter_Skelter ( 1976 ) , The_Enforcer ( 1976 ) , The_Driver ( 1978 ) , Defiance ( 1980 ) , Beverly_Hills_Cop II ( 1987 ) , Quicksilver ( 1986 ) , Colors ( 1988 ) , and Open_House ( 1987 ) . The_acting_career of Rudy_Ramos has_covered six_decades and started with an_appearance on the_television_show , Ironside in 1969 . Six_months later he was_cast as a_series_regular , playing the_part of Wind the_volatile_half-breed_Indian_boy in the_legendary_television western_The_High_Chaparral .
